day-on-the-beach.title: Day on the Beach
day-on-the-beach.subtitle: Story that teaches kids about pushing and hitting
day-on-the-beach.description: Child who is hitting?  This engaging story can help them understand the consequences of hurting others and the benefits of playing nice.

soccer-fun.title: Soccer Fun
soccer-fun.subtitle: Story that teaches kids about hurting others
soccer-fun.description: Kid is hurting others?  This engaging story can help them understand the consequences of hurting others and the benefits of playing nice.

snow-time.title: Snow Time?
snow-time.subtitle: Story that teaches kids about anger
snow-time.description: Child who has trouble controlling their anger?  This engaging story can help them understand the benefits of controlling their anger and how to do it.

angry-choices.title: Angry Choices
angry-choices.subtitle: Stories that teach kids about hitting, hurting others, and anger
angry-choices.description: Collection of engaging short stories that help kids understand the benefits of controlling their anger and what they can do instead.

bad-luck.title: Bad Luck
bad-luck.subtitle: Story that teaches kids about thinking for themselves
bad-luck.description: Want to teach your child to be less gullible?  This engaging story teaches kids about the benefits of checking ideas out for yourself and not believing everything you hear.

the-furbots.title: The Furbots
the-furbots.subtitle: Story that teaches kids to question advertising
the-furbots.description: Is your child heavily influenced by advertising?  This engaging story teaches kids about the motivation behind advertising and the risks of believing everything they hear.

yelling-magic.title: Yelling Magic
yelling-magic.subtitle: Story that teaches kids to think critically
yelling-magic.description: Worried that your child is too gullible?  This engaging story teaches kids about the importance of thinking critically and investigating their ideas.

super-jet-3000.title: Super Jet 3000
super-jet-3000.subtitle: Story that teaches kids about honesty
super-jet-3000.description: Want your child to be more honest?  This engaging story teaches kids about the benefits of honesty and the risk of lying to get the things we want.

the-broken-toy.title: The Broken Toy
the-broken-toy.subtitle: Story that teaches kids not to lie
the-broken-toy.description: Catch your child lying to you?  This engaging story teaches kids about the benefits of honesty and the consequences of lying to avoid getting in trouble.

basketball-contest.title: Basketball Contest
basketball-contest.subtitle: Story that teaches about telling the truth
basketball-contest.description: Worried about your child's lying?  This engaging story teaches kids about the benefits of honesty and the consequences of lying to make others like them.

trust-and-honesty.title: Trust and Honesty
trust-and-honesty.subtitle: Stories that teaches kids about lying
trust-and-honesty.description: Worried about your child's lying?  This collection of engaging stories teaches kids about the benefits of honesty.
